title: 1000+ Watch Faces
summary: A beautiful collection of 1000+ Watch Faces that automatically change every hour

descriptionHTML:
*********Ranked Top Watch face in Android Headlines- September edition*********

http://www.androidheadlines.com/2016/09/top-10-android-wear-apps-and-faces-september-2016-edition.html

*********************************************************************************************

Presenting "1000 Watch Faces” which is a unique and intelligent Smart Watch application that features a supreme collection of 1000 beautiful watch faces with best in class user interface for customization.

The carefully crafted design of the app syncs up your mobile and your smart watch seamlessly and provides rich user experience making it simple and easy to use.

The unique features of the app are:
- Watch Face changes automatically every hour.
- Completely customizable to choose any Watch Face as permanent for every day
- Analog and Digital dials available
- Dynamically change the dial color based on the Image background. “Truly Fantastic “!!
- Choose from a list of 20 categories based on the below themes.
. Abstract
. Birds
. Cats
. Christmas
. Clipart
. Dogs
. Flowers
. Gradient
. Inspiring
. Life
. Music
. Nature
. Occasions
. Love
. Seasons
. Smiley
. Space
. Sports
. Wild Animals

So, what are you waiting for? Download this unique app and enjoy a special and amazing experience


Note : Only support android wear watches,
watches like Samsung Gear,DZ09 ,Sony smartwatch are not supported
comments: Literally doesn't do anything for me. It only shows one plain watchface and doesn't show what I select, it doesn't change or announce the time or anything else it's supposed to do.

I would definitely give it a 5, and will, except their digital watch leaves a bit to be desired. I prefer digital, as watch hands are not always easy to see in a fast paced work environment. I love that you can change the font and time position, however, I wish you could change the color of the writing, as white doesn't show on all faces. Additionally wish you could change font size to bigger or smaller. Also, top and bottom positioning are VERY top and bottom, which doesn't look great on a round face watch.

Great app for my smart watch. Only one thing stops me from giving a 5. It uses wifi only to transfer watch faces automatically. I would expect it to switch to Bluetooth when no wifi but instead the watch faces just stop changing until I get a wifi signal again. This should be fixed. There's no reason not to use Bluetooth.
Very basic. I had problems tranfering watchfaces to my watch, was not worth the effort. Now uninstalled, there are alot better watch face apps out there.
recentChanges: Add more favourites with increased limit ,
